item.title: Why Room362?
item.author: mubix
item.description: (This post got lost in the intertubes and it took a bit to get back, Archive.org nor Google cache had it) I get this question all the time: “Why room362.com?” I have answered that question in a lot of ways, depending on the perceived amount of time I had to tell the story. But, on a blog you have tons of time, right? Not if you are studying the Twitter boom.
